name: 罗伊尔·艾伦
introduction: Royal Allen is an actor, writer, & voice over artist.He is best known for his work on the Netflix series "Cobra Kai," & "Ozark." He is also known for his work on the Investigation Discovery series "Murder Calls," "Murder Comes to Town," & "Your Worst Nightmare," as well as his leading work in the award-winning short films "Hey Bud!" & "Reality Check."Royal is currently waiting for his reality check to clear.
